comments.body: I think I was copying another example when I put this together, but now that I know the system better, is there anyreason to include the version in the lables & name like this? I think we could probably just rely on the image version.
Might be specific to the addon code, but all other addons do this. Will probably be fixed when we move addons to deployment object.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: kube-ui-v3
  namespace: kube-system
  labels:
